Name: Shape Palette
About the game: Shape Palette is a 2D puzzle game that offers simple gameplay which builds with each stage introducing new rules & challenges. Place, combine, splash & maneuver around obstacles in numerous shape-bending puzzles. Features Focus On Puzzle Solving With Minimal & Simple Visuals Play 49 Different Hand Crafted Levels Evolving Game Mechanics Including Combining, Splashing & Various Shape Types Play Entirely With A Mouse! Colourblind Mode To Support Users With Vision Difficulties Difficulty Ramping Including Challenging Bonus Levels
